text: Ate inham nu nuha da hala suna'u. Jadom usa ne apani kauma nu kiha si ki he meri kauma! Jekara mera khara hona ate alaha di'am a'itam nala upadesa karana tuhanu bhari lagada hai, tam maim alaha upara bharosa kita. Tusim sahimati nala apana phaisala kara lavo ate apane bana'e sarikam nu vi nala lai a'u tam ki tuhanu apane phaisale te saka na rahe phira tusim loka jo kujha mere nala karana cahude ho, uha kara di'u ate mainu mauka vi na di'u
